name: Counting Red Apples
description:
Can you recognize Apples among many fruits? Can you count how many Apples in the board of fruits are? Let's try and enjoy it.

- How to play:
+ Counting all Apples in the board.
+ Compare with the big number on the big Apple in the big circle.
+ Chose the correct answer (true or false) as quickly as you can to enjoy the the piano music.

- Reach the high score, compete with other players around the world.

- Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/khanglbtk
- Visit my website: http://khangle.me
